decision_conditions: The submitted information in pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission 216248FUL dated 13/12/2021, is deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to adhere to the objective of ensuring acceptable sound insulation in accordance with policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), policies 3.5 and 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and SPG10.
description: Details of sound insulation, in pursuant to condition 7 of planning application Ref: 216248FUL dated 13/12/2021 for 'Part first and second floor rear extension, forming one additional self contained flat at second floor level and an extension to first floor flat of existing building (comprising restaurant at ground floor level with flats above)'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
